item.value: HAL_Delay(1); // Small delay for bit timing
while (__HAL_TIM_GET_FLAG(&htim3, TIM_FLAG_UPDATE) == RESET); // Wait for timer update event __HAL_TIM_CLEAR_FLAG(&htim3, TIM_FLAG_UPDATE)
while (__HAL_TIM_GET_FLAG(&htim3, TIM_FLAG_UPDATE) == RESET); // Wait for timer update event __HAL_TIM_CLEAR_FLAG(&htim3, TIM_FLAG_UPDATE);
